section.p: You arrive at Disaster Bay, where you find a community of fishermen. Judging by their wealth, they also make a living by other means - you suspect by looting the ships that get wrecked in the stormy waters of the bay.
A man offers to take you by boat, safely through the bay, and north to the port of Yarimura, on the Great Steppes. It will cost you 50 Shards.

choices.choice: Pay 50 Shards to go to Yarimura
